articles.content: Divyansh and Manuraj won Sony TVs reality show India’s Got Talent Season 9 on Sunday. The beatboxing and flautist duo from Jaipur and Bharatpur beat Ishita Vishwakarma, Rishabh Chaturvedi, Bomb Fire … [+2874 chars]

articles.title: Hunarbaaz Finale Review: Neetu Kapoor dances to Alia Bhatt's songs, Akash Singh's big win - PINKVILLA
articles.description: Hunarbaaz, the talent-based reality show ended today. From Neetu Kapoor dancing to bahu Alia Bhatt's songs to new mom Bharti Singh resuming work in just 12 days post-delivery, here's what all happened in the finale episode of the show.
